memberdef.name: ZE_GUARD
memberdef.initializer: do { \ ze_result_t _st = (expr); \ if (_st != ZE_RESULT_SUCCESS) { \ std::ostringstream _oss; \ _oss << (msg) << " (ze_result=" << (int)_st << ")"; \ set_err(_oss.str().c_str()); \ return -(int)_st; \ } \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: ZE guard macro: store message and return negative code on failure.
Set last error (thread-local); truncates if needed.
Read a whole binary file into memory.
Ensure Level Zero context, device and immediate command list exist.

detaileddescription.para:
Picks the first GPU device on the first driver found.
0 on success; negative on error.

briefdescription.para: Ensure the SPIR-V module and all kernel handles are created.
Copy host→device or device→host using immediate command list.
Helper to set a POD kernel argument.
